message: Seems legit. Who knows. I mean, ISIS do love to claim responsibility for stuff even when it's not proven. At the same time, in the internet age, pledging allegiance to a group thousands of miles away is pretty easy. I think it shows the power of ISIS propoganda and their reach to almost anywhere an internet connection is available.
